pages.text:
BECOME A MEMBER AT ARLINGTON RIDGE
Now is the perfect time to become a member at Arlington Ridge! Whether you are looking for a Golf Membership, or a Social Membership. With multiple options to choose from, we have a plan that fits all lifestyles!
Join today and take part in exclusive member only golf events, social events & dining events.
RESIDENT MEMBERSHIP
Membership Benefits:
Unlimited Green Fees
10% Off Food
28 Day Advanced Tee Times
10% Off Select Golf Shop Merch
Monthly Member Events
GHIN Handicap
Unlimited Practice Balls
Member Charging Privileges
Road Trips
NON-RESIDENT MEMBERSHIP
Membership Benefits:
Unlimited Green Fees
10% Off Food
28 Day Advanced Tee Times
10% Off Select Golf Shop Merch
Monthly Member Events
GHIN Handicap
Unlimited Practice Balls
Member Charging Privileges
Road Trips
SOCIAL MEMBERSHIP
Household Membership Benefits:
10% Off Food
Preferred Pricing on Special Events
10% Off Select Golf Shop Merch
Member Charging Privileges
Access to Member Only Events
Option A:
Receive Membership Benefits outlined above, plus:
3 discounted green fees ($25) per month
Discounted practice balls
Option B:
Receive Membership Benefits outlined above, plus:
$25 restaurant credit per household, per month
